participant_1.background:
I'll help others by recommending my favorite shows on Netflix.
I would love to be reincarnated as a chef, so I can continue to share my love of food with others.
After a long day of designing and testing new environmental technologies, I relax by going for a run in my blue shoes.
Last year, I painted a portrait of my two small dogs.
i am seventy one years old.

participant_2.background:
I am moving to a new city because my family is relocating.
i m dissatisfied with the school life i ve had so far.
I eat fruits like apples and bananas for their natural sweetness.
i have always wanted to travel to ireland or puerto rico.
The weather doesn't matter to me as long as I can go shopping and listen to rock music.

content.text: Hello! How is your day going?
It is going alright. I am just getting ready for my move to a new city.
Oh that sounds exciting! I am always a bit nervous about moving to new places.
I am a bit nervous too, but I am looking forward to new adventures.
What city are you moving to?
I am moving to San Francisco!
Oh wow! That is a great city! I have always wanted to visit there.
I have heard great things about it too! I am excited to explore it.
I am sure you will have a great time. What are some of your favorite things to do?
I love to go shopping, listen to music, and hang out with my friends.
Sounds like we have some similar interests! I also love to go shopping and listen to music.
That is great! We should definitely hang out sometime when I get settled in.
That would be fun! I am sure we would have a lot to talk about.
I am sure we would too!
